title: what happens when solr index limit exceeds
description: what happens when solr index limit exceeds?

comments.author: Shawn Heisey
comments.content:
Your description is unclear, but it sounds like an information request, or possibly a support request.  If this is what you are after, please join the solr-user mailing list and post your question there.

http://lucene.apache.org/solr/resources.html#mailing-lists

Before you post to the mailing lists, be sure that you understand how to get the most benefit from the mailing list:

http://wiki.apache.org/solr/UsingMailingLists

This issue tracker (Jira) is for feature requests or for problem reports.  If your issue falls into either of those categories, then re-open this and edit the title and description to be as informative as possible regarding the problem you are experiencing or the new feature that you'd like to see implemented.
